languages.text: "Тебе незачем уродовать мой язык, мон-кай — я владею вашим в достаточной мере, чтобы вести разговор с элантах без переводчика. И коль разгадал ты мой путь, то и я буду пряма в своих речах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос бросает на дознавателя безучастный взгляд.{/n} "Тебе незачем уродовать мой язык, мон-кай — я владею вашим в достаточной мере, чтобы вести разговор с эл'антар без переводчика".

languages.text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."
languages.original_text: "Тебе незачем уродовать мой язык, мон-кай — я владею вашим в достаточной мере, чтобы вести разговор с элантах без переводчика. И коль разгадал ты мой путь, то и я буду пряма в своих речах".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with el'antar without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."
"There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with el'antar without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."
"There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with el'antar without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."
"There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

languages.text: “你没必要摧残我的语言，猴子。我可以很流畅地说你们的语言，不需要翻译也可以与外界人交流。既然你已经认清了我的道途，那我就有话直说了。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: “你没必要摧残我的语言，猴子。我可以很流畅地说你们的语言，不需要翻译也可以与外界人交流。既然你已经认清了我的道途，那我就有话直说了。”

languages.text: «No hay necesidad de mutilar mi lenguaje, mon-keigh: hablo el tuyo con fluidez suficiente sin un traductor. Y, ya que has descubierto mi senda, hablaré con claridad».
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: «No hay necesidad de mutilar mi lenguaje, mon-keigh: hablo el tuyo con fluidez suficiente sin un traductor. Y, ya que has descubierto mi senda, hablaré con claridad».

languages.text: 「我らの言語を汚す必要はない、モン＝ケイよ…翻訳機なしでエランタと会話できる程度には、あなたたちの言葉を使える。我が道を理解しているようなので、率直に話がしたい」
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの言語を汚す必要はない、モン＝ケイよ…翻訳機なしでエランタと会話できる程度には、あなたたちの言葉を使える。我が道を理解しているようなので、率直に話がしたい」

languages.text: "Es besteht kein Grund, meine Sprache zu verunstalten, Chem-Pan-Sey – ich spreche die Eure gut genug, um ohne Übersetzer mit {mf|dem|der} Elantach zu kommunizieren. Und da Ihr meine Herkunft erkannt habt, will ich offen sein."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: "Es besteht kein Grund, meine Sprache zu verunstalten, Chem-Pan-Sey – ich spreche die Eure gut genug, um ohne Übersetzer mit {mf|dem|der} Elantach zu kommunizieren. Und da Ihr meine Herkunft erkannt habt, will ich offen sein."

languages.text: « Inutile de massacrer ma langue, mon-keigh. Je parle la vôtre suffisamment bien pour discuter avec des elantach sans traducteur. Et puisque vous avez discerné ma voie, je vais m'exprimer franchement. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de massacrer ma langue, mon-keigh. Je parle la vôtre suffisamment bien pour discuter avec des elantach sans traducteur. Et puisque vous avez discerné ma voie, je vais m'exprimer franchement. »

languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

languages.text: "Dilimi tahrip etmene gerek yok mon-keigh. Dilinizi, elantach ile çevirmen olmadan iletişime geçebilecek kadar iyi konuşuyorum. Yolumun farkına vardığınızdan ötürü sizinle doğrudan konuşacağım."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to mutilate my language, mon-keigh — I speak yours well enough to converse with elantach without a translator. And since you have discerned my path, I will be direct in my speech."

traits.locale_text: "Dilimi tahrip etmene gerek yok mon-keigh. Dilinizi, elantach ile çevirmen olmadan iletişime geçebilecek kadar iyi konuşuyorum. Yolumun farkına vardığınızdan ötürü sizinle doğrudan konuşacağım."
